resources.string:
No more pairings are available!

Ego Eater has only recently launched. Your support is critical for starting profiles.

Unfortunately, there are no more users in your area to vote on. Please, stick with us.

We'll notify you if someone new signs up in your area.

You do not have any matches. Rank more profiles to find people who like you back.\n\n Ego Eater is a brand new app. There may not be any profiles left to rank. Be a hero and stick with us to start this.

Once you message a match, that match becomes locked. The daily algorithm won\'t remove the match.\n \n If you like the person, message them quickly. If you want someone "better," keep ranking more profiles.
Break the silence! Send a message!
A button that sends the current message.
Please be impatient and drum your fingers!
To match you up with local hotties, we gotta know where you are. Please, enable the location service.
The profile photo of a user.
The thumbnail of a profile photo of a user.
A lock icon that indicates if a profile is locked or not.
An icon that indicates that a new message has arrived.
A heart shaped icon that indicates that you like that user.
Woohoo! Ego Eater has new matches for you!
Once a day, Ego Eater runs an algorithm to pair the hotties of the world. The algorithm just finished running. You\'ve got some hot peeps to check out!
You\'ve had some matches in Ego Eater. Now they are gone.

Once a day, Ego Eater runs an algorithm to pair the hotties of the world. The last person just lost interest in you. But fret not. There are many things you can do. (1) Rank more users to find the special one who\'s into you. (2) Text your matches faster. Once you sent the first message, the match becomes locked. (3) This is the hardest yet most satisfying. Become more attractive. Hit the gym. Get new clothes. Put a smile on your face by following your passion.
Check out what a cutie is writing you!
